abstract: H W Baldwin on Poles fighting with Allies
snippet: As the furious fighting in the Flanders pocket dies and the thunder of the guns along the Somme and the Aisne heralds what may be the beginning of a new offensive, the flags of a Polish Army are once again fluttering defiance to the forces of Hitl...

headline.main: THE POLES FIGHT AGAIN; One Polish Unit in Norway

lead_paragraph: As the furious fighting in the Flanders pocket dies and the thunder of the guns along the Somme and the Aisne heralds what may be the beginning of a new offensive, the flags of a Polish Army are once again fluttering defiance to the forces of Hitler.
